question: Identify the current technological focus areas of companies in the IT industry and their investment trends.

subtasks.task: Query the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table to gather all technological focus areas associated with companies in the IT industry.
Join the results from CompanyFocusAreaDetail with CompanyInfo to filter only those companies that belong to the IT industry by using the Industry column.
Retrieve financial metrics like ITBudget and Revenue from the CompanyInfo table to assess the investment trends related to technology focus areas of the identified IT companies.
Compile the findings to analyze and summarize the technological focus areas alongside their corresponding investment levels to identify investment trends in the IT industry.
